boardgame.name: David _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Goliath
David and Goliath
大卫与歌利亚 (大衛與歌利亞)
boardgame.description: This game adds a very interesting twist to the standard trick-taking genre. There are five suits and players must follow suit, if they can. However, the winner of the trick is the highest card played, regardless of suit. The winner gets all the cards from the trick, minus the card he won it with. That card is given to the player that played the lowest card. After all tricks have been played, the scoring begins. Players score the face-value of the cards in the suits that they only collected one or two of, and one point per card for suits with more than two. The player with the most points after a number of hands wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Bought new, played never, put away. In excellent condition, in shrinkwrap, never opened. With English rules. Scroll down and read the Signature message for latest info. Updated info will be in there. UK BUYERS - Very cost effective to get two or three games. MyHermes, 0-1kg starts at £2.79, but up to 10kg is from just £6.49. Adding one or two more games is very good value for you. 10kg gets you a lot of games. See their current prices here (scroll down after clicking): https://www.myhermes.co.uk/our-services/our-prices.html Payment - read the Signature below for latest methods. I now accept BANK TRANSFER - best for UK buyer if your bank has zero fees. For overseas buyer, I have my IBAN and suggest you look at https://transferwise.com/ Cheaper than Paypal, especially with their cross-border fees too. Paypal, happy to receive Paypal in GBP, USD, JPY, EUR, but either make it a Gift please or pay the extra fees. I have great feedback!!! I can provide photos of my copy on request (message me your email). UK - Can ship quickly cheaply by courier. REST OF EUROPE - Can ship quickish by Royal Mail JAPAN- Card games and small games to Japan are very easy. Small parcels can easily go by Royal Mail. USA / CAN - As for Japan but I work out the cheapest method for you. Anything over 2kg or over 90cm in total three sides is difficult. Always ask me first.
